data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Martins, Luciana (2018): Taxonomy of the genus Thyonella (Holothuroidea: Dendrochirotida), with mention of the first record of T. sabanillaensis from the southwestern Atlantic Ocean. Zootaxa 4527 (1): 75-86, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4527.1.6|13 occurrences
